text: Valeriu Muravschi (31 July 1949 – 8 April 2020) was a Moldovan politician and businessman. He was the first Prime Minister of Moldova between 28 May 1991 and 1 July 1992. He also was Minister of Finance from 1990 to 1991. From 1998 to 2001, he was a member of Parliament. Muravschi died on 8 April 2020 in Chișinău at the age of 70.Скончался бывший премьер Молдовы Валериу Муравски ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Moldovan businesspeople Category:Prime ministers of Moldova
title: Valeriu Muravschi
